    • merge

      public Span.Builder merge​(Span source)
      Used to merge multiple incomplete spans representing the same operation on the same host. Do not use this to merge spans that occur on different hosts.

    • kind

      @Nullable public Span.Kind kind()

    • localEndpoint

      @Nullable public Endpoint localEndpoint()

    • traceId

      public Span.Builder traceId​(String traceId)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if not lower-hex format
      See Also:
      Span.id()

    • traceId

      public Span.Builder traceId​(long high, long low)
      Encodes 64 or 128 bits from the input into a hex trace ID.
      Parameters:
      high - Upper 64bits of the trace ID. Zero means the trace ID is 64-bit.
      low - Lower 64bits of the trace ID.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if both values are zero

    • parentId

      public Span.Builder parentId​(long parentId)
      Encodes 64 bits from the input into a hex parent ID. Unsets the Span.parentId() if the input is 0.
      See Also:
      Span.parentId()

    • parentId

      public Span.Builder parentId​(@Nullable String parentId)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if not lower-hex format
      See Also:
      Span.parentId()

    • id

      public Span.Builder id​(long id)
      Encodes 64 bits from the input into a hex span ID.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input is zero
      See Also:
      Span.id()
